MIA (Modular Image Analysis)

Modular, object-based analysis for ImageJ/Fiji

View on GitHub
Introduction Getting started Modules List of modules Macros Extending MIA
Back to module list

Binary operations (legacy)

Description

***DEPRECATED*** This module will be removed soon. Please use individual binary modules.

Parameters

  • Input image
    • Type: InputImageP
  • Apply to input image
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Output image
    • Type: OutputImageP
  • Filter mode
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Dilate 2D
    • Choices:
      • Dilate 2D
      • Dilate 3D
      • Distance map 3D
      • Erode 2D
      • Erode 3D
      • Fill holes 2D
      • Fill holes 3D
      • Outline 2D
      • Skeletonise 2D
      • Watershed 2D
      • Watershed 3D
  • Number of iterations
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 1
  • Use markers
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: false
  • Input marker image
    • Type: InputImageP
  • Intensity mode
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Distance
    • Choices:
      • Distance
      • Input image intensity
  • Intensity image
    • Type: InputImageP
  • Dynamic
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 1
  • Connectivity (3D)
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: 6
    • Choices:
      • 6
      • 26
  • Match Z to XY
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
ModularImageAnalysis is maintained by SJCross. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
